newsitem.title: USA: Hudson Technologies, DuPont in alliance.
newsitem.headline: Hudson Technologies, DuPont in alliance.

text.p: Hudson Technologies Inc said Wednesday it had formerd a "strategic alliance" with DuPont Co's DuPont Fluoroproducts affiliate in which DuPont would acquire a ten-percent stake in the company.
The company, which supplies refrigerant management and reclamation services, did not disclose the financial terms of the deal.
Under the deal, it will provide recovery, reclamation, separation, packaging and testing services to DuPont for marketing through its authorized distributor network, it said.
It will also market DuPont refrigerant products together with Hudson reclamation and refrigerant management services, it added.

Hudson said it had already had a close business relationship with DuPont for several years, providing field service collection and reclamation of used chlorofluorocarbon and hydrochlorofluorocarbon products from DuPont distributors.
